name: GET_asm-groups-group_id-suppressions
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve all suppressed email addresses belonging to the given group.**

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

group_id.description: The id of the unsubscribe group that you are adding suppressions to.

$block: The list of email addresses belonging to the given suppression group.
